functions.name: IsConstexprName
functions.logic: Checks if a given name starts with the 'constexpr ' prefix, indicating it's a constexpr type.

functions.name: GetNonConstexprName
functions.logic: If a name starts with 'constexpr ', it removes the prefix and returns the rest of the name. Otherwise, it returns the original name.

functions.name: GetConstexprName
functions.logic: If a name does not start with 'constexpr ', it adds the prefix and returns the new name. Otherwise, it returns the original name.
